==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Sayu
|language            = ja
|name                = 早柚

<!-- Hello -->
|vo_01_01_title      = 初めまして…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 「終末番」早柚、参上。<br />ふぅ～、やる事なかったら、拙は先に寝る。言っておくが、こっそりと拙の頭を撫でるんじゃないぞ。
|vo_01_01_rm         = "Shuumatsuban" Sayu, sanjou.<br />Fuu~, yaru koto nakattara, setsu wa saki ni neru. Itte oku ga, kossori to setsu no atama wo naderu nja nai zo.
|vo_01_01_tl         = Sayu of the Shuumatsuban, reporting.<br />Whew, if there's nothing to do, I'm going to sleep. But let me say one thing: don't try to pat my head while I'm not looking.

<!-- Chats -->
|vo_02_01_title      = 世間話・寝る
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Asleep
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Asleep.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = ふぁ～…ぐーぐー…
|vo_02_01_rm         = Fa~... guuguu...
|vo_02_01_tl         = *yawns* *snoring*

|vo_02_02_title      = 世間話・仕事
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Work
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Work.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 仕事なんかよりお昼寝だ。
|vo_02_02_rm         = Shigoto nanka yori ohirune da.
|vo_02_02_tl         = I'd rather be napping than working.

|vo_02_03_title      = 世間話・背伸びる
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Height
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Height.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = いつになったら背が伸びるんだ。
|vo_02_03_rm         = Itsu ni nattara se ga nobiru nda.
|vo_02_03_tl         = I wonder when I'll grow taller.

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title      = 雨の日…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = はやく雨宿りを。雨に打たれると背が伸びなくなる！
|vo_03_01_rm         = Hayaku amayadori wo. Ame ni utareru to se ga nobinaku naru!
|vo_03_01_tl         = Quick, let's find shelter. Getting hit by the rain means no growing taller!

|vo_03_02_title      = 雷の日…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 凄まじい音だ。だが、布団にこもってしまえば安心して眠れる。
|vo_03_02_rm         = Susamajii oto da. Daga, futon ni komotte shimaeba anshin shite nemureru.
|vo_03_02_tl         = That's some terrific noise! But if you just curl up in your futon, you can sleep in peace.

|vo_03_03_title      = 雪の日…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 雪の日は身を隠しやすい。例えば「雪降りの術」は、吹きつける雪の力を借りることで自分の身を隠す、他の者が気づく頃には降りしきる雪しか残ってない。ちなみにこのことは、巫女姉さんに教えてはいけないぞ。
|vo_03_03_rm         = Yuki no hi wa mi wo kakushiyasui. Tatoeba "Yukifuri no Jutsu" wa, fukitsukeru yuki no chikara wo kariru koto de jibun no mi wo kakusu, hoka no mono ga kidzuku koro ni wa furishikiru yuki shika nokottenai. Chinami ni kono koto wa, miko-nee-san ni oshiete wa ikenai zo.
|vo_03_03_tl         = It's easy to hide yourself on a snowy day. For example, there's the "Snowfall Technique," where you use the blowing snow to conceal yourself, and other people will see nothing but the snow falling through the air. By the way, don't tell the shrine maiden about this.

|vo_03_04_title      = 晴れの日…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 気持ちいい天気、ふぁ～ねむい。
|vo_03_04_rm         = Kimochi ii tenki, fa~ Nemui.
|vo_03_04_tl         = The weather's so nice... *yawns* I'm getting sleepy.

|vo_03_05_title      = 風の日…
|vo_03_05_subtitle   = When It's Windy
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It's Windy.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = 風吹く時は逃げる時。
|vo_03_05_rm         = Kaze fuku toki wa nigeru toki.
|vo_03_05_tl         = When the wind blows, it's time to get away.

|vo_03_06_title      = 暴風の日…
|vo_03_06_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_06_tx         = 風が強すぎて目を開けられない。いっそのこと、そのまま目を閉じて寝てしまおうか。
|vo_03_06_rm         = Kaze ga tsuyosugite me wo akerarenai. Isso no koto, sono mama me wo tojite nete shimaou ka.
|vo_03_06_tl         = The wind's so strong, I can't open my eyes. Maybe I should just keep them closed and go to sleep.

<!-- Greetings -->
|vo_04_01_title      = おはよう…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = ん…もうあさなのか？あと10分、10分だけ…え、じゃあ5分でもいいから…ふみゃ…
|vo_04_01_rm         = N... Mou asa na no ka? Ato juppun, juppun dake... E, jaa gofun demo ii kara... Fumya...
|vo_04_01_tl         = Hmm... It's morning already? Ten more minutes, just ten more minutes... Huh? Okay, I'll take five minutes... *snores*

|vo_04_02_title      = こんにちは…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = ね…ねむい。お昼寝の時間はまだ？
|vo_04_02_rm         = Ne... nemui. Ohirune no jikan wa mada?
|vo_04_02_tl         = So... sleepy. It's still not time for an afternoon nap yet?

|vo_04_03_title      = こんばんは…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 確認完了、周囲に巫女姉さんの姿はないな。今夜はぐっすり眠れるぞ。
|vo_04_03_rm         = Kakunin kanryou, shuui ni miko-nee-san no sugata wa nai na. Kon'ya wa gussuri nemureru zo.
|vo_04_03_tl         = Confirmed, no shrine maiden spotted in the surrounding area. I can sleep soundly tonight.

|vo_04_04_title      = おやすみ…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = やっと…寝れる…おや…すみ…
|vo_04_04_rm         = Yatto... nereru... oya... sumi...
|vo_04_04_tl         = Finally... bedtime... good... night...

<!-- About Sayu -->
|vo_05_01_title      = {name}自身について・終末番
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Shuumatsuban
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Shuumatsuban.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 拙は「終末番」に所属しているが、与えられた仕事は情報収集だの、盗みだのといった細かい事ばかり。別に…拙がやらなくても問題ないと思う。
|vo_05_01_rm         = Setsu wa "Shuumatsuban" ni shozoku shiteiru ga, ataerareta shigoto wa jouhou shuushuu da no, nusumi da no to itta komakai koto bakari. Betsu ni... setsu ga yaranakute mo mondai nai to omou.
|vo_05_01_tl         = I'm part of the Shuumatsuban, but all the jobs I get are little things like information gathering or stealing. I don't think it really matters if I don't do it.

|vo_05_02_title      = {name}自身について・サボる
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Skiving
|vo_05_02_friendship = 4
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Skiving.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 「終末番」の仕事なんか端から意味がない。サボったって、もっと適任の人がやってくれる。だが寝ることは大事だ。長く眠れば、いつか背が伸びるかもしれない。
|vo_05_02_rm         = "Shuumatsuban" no shigoto nanka hana kara imi ga nai. Sabotta tte, motto tekinin no hito ga yatte kureru. Daga neru koto wa daiji da. Nagaku nemureba, itsuka se ga nobiru ka mo shirenai.
|vo_05_02_tl         = My work at the Shuumatsuban has always been pointless. If I skip a job, someone more capable will do it for me. But sleeping is important. If I sleep for long enough, I might grow taller one day.

<!-- About Us -->
|vo_06_01_title      = 見張りについて…
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Favor
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Favor.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 巫女姉さんが来る時は必ず伝えてくれ。拙はちょっと昼寝…いや、しばらく休むことにする。
|vo_06_01_rm         = Miko-nee-san ga kuru toki wa kanarazu tsutaete kure. Setsu wa chotto hirune... iya, shibaraku yasumu koto ni suru.
|vo_06_01_tl         = You should definitely tell me if the shrine maiden is coming. I'm gonna take a quick nap... I mean, rest for a while.

|vo_06_02_title      = 頭を撫でることについて…
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Headpats
|vo_06_02_friendship    = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Headpats.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 頭を撫でたい？うっ、主ならよかろう。だが、ちょっとだけだぞ。背が伸びなくなるのは御免だ！
|vo_06_02_rm         = Atama wo nadetai? U', nushi nara yokarou. Daga, chotto dake da zo. Se ga nobinaku naru no wa gomen da!
|vo_06_02_tl         = You want to pat my head? Hmm, if it's you, it's all right. But only a little. The last thing I want is not being able to grow!

<!-- Miscellaneous I -->
|vo_07_01_title      = 「神の目」について…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship    = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 両手剣は本当に重たい。忍術だけに頼っていては、持ち上げることすらできない。しかし「神の目」があれば話は別。拙にとって「神の目」は欠かせないものなのだ。
|vo_07_01_rm         = Ryoute-ken wa hontou ni omotai. Ninjutsu dake ni tayotteite wa, mochiageru koto sura dekinai. Shikashi "Kami no Me" ga areba hanashi wa betsu. Setsu ni totte "Kami no Me" wa kakasenai mono na no da.
|vo_07_01_tl         = Claymores are really heavy. If I only relied on ninjutsu, I wouldn't even be able to lift one. But with a Vision, it's a different story. That's why my Vision is something I can't go without.

|vo_07_02_title      = シェアしたいこと…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 師匠は拙が最後の世代だとおっしゃってたし、なにせ戦いに向いていない流派だ。逃げたり身を隠したりする術しか学んでいなかったのも、仕方のないこと…
|vo_07_02_rm         = Shishou wa setsu ga saigo no sedai da to osshatteta shi, nanise tatakai ni muiteinai ryuuha da. Nigetari mi wo kakushitari suru sube shika manandeinakatta no mo, shikata no nai koto...
|vo_07_02_tl         = My master said I'd be the last generation of our school, and it's not a style that's good for fighting anyway. The only techniques I learned were for escape and concealment, and there's not much I can do about that...

|vo_07_03_title      = 興味のあること…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = ムジナは知ってるか？タヌキよりもずっとかわいい生き物だ。今度見に行く時、一緒に連れてってやってもいいぞ。
|vo_07_03_rm         = Mujina wa shitteru ka? Tanuki yori mo zutto kawaii ikimono da. Kondo mi ni iku toki, issho ni tsuretette yatte mo ii zo.
|vo_07_03_tl         = Do you know the mujina? It's a creature that's much cuter than the tanuki. Next time you want to see one, I can take you with me.

<!-- About Others -->
|vo_08_01_title      = 神里綾華について…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Kamisato Ayaka]]
|vo_08_01_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kamisato Ayaka.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 神里家のお嬢様は、優雅で威厳のあるお方だが、拙が怠けないように、特別に巫女姉さんを監視役として任命した…どうして、こんなことになったのだ…
|vo_08_01_rm         = Kamisato-ke no ojou-sama wa, yuuga de igen no aru okata da ga, setsu ga namakenai you ni, tokubetsu ni miko-nee-san wo kanshiyaku toshite ninmei shita... Doushite, konna koto ni natta no da...
|vo_08_01_tl         = The lady of the Kamisato Clan is so graceful and dignified, but she specially appointed a shrine maiden to watch over me just to keep me from slacking off... How did things end up like this...

|vo_08_02_title      = 神里綾人について…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Kamisato Ayato]]
|vo_08_02_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kamisato Ayato.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 木の上で休んでいると、よく巫女姉さんたちがあのお方の噂をしているのが聞こえる。どうやら仕事で忙しいお方のようだが、理解できぬ。仕事なんかサボってしまえばいいのに…
|vo_08_02_rm         = Ki no ue de yasundeiru to, yoku miko-nee-san-tachi ga ano okata no uwasa wo shiteiru no ga kikoeru. Douyara shigoto de isogashii okata no you da ga, rikai dekinu. Shigoto nanka sabotte shimaeba ii no ni...
|vo_08_02_tl         = When I'm resting up in a tree, I often hear the shrine maidens gossiping about him. It seems like he's very busy with his work, but I don't get it. He could just skip work if he wanted to...

|vo_08_03_title      = トーマについて…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Thoma]]
|vo_08_03_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Thoma.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 神の目を持ってるくせに、やつは毎回のように忍術を学びたいとしつこく懇願してくる。理解できぬ。睡眠時間を削ってまで教えるなんて…時間がもったいない。
|vo_08_03_rm         = Kami no Me wo motteru kuse ni, yatsu wa maikai no you ni ninjutsu wo manabitai to shitsukoku kongan shite kuru. Rikai dekinu. Suimin jikan wo kezutte made oshieru nante... jikan ga mottainai.
|vo_08_03_tl         = That guy has a Vision, but he always insists on asking me to teach him ninjutsu. I don't get it. Teaching would cut into my sleeping hours... what a waste of time.

|vo_08_04_title      = 宵宮について…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Yoimiya]]
|vo_08_04_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yoimiya.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 彼女は会うたびに「タヌキちゃん、お祭りで遊ばへん？」だのと言ってくるが、拙はタヌキなどではない。お祭りにも興味ない。行くことになったとしても、彼女の花火に合わせて忍術を披露するだけ。これが「終末番」の仕事とどう関係すると言うのだ！
|vo_08_04_rm         = Kanojo wa au tabi ni "Tanuki-chan, omatsuri de asobahen?" da no to itte kuru ga, setsu wa tanuki nado de wa nai. Omatsuri ni mo kyoumi nai. Iku koto ni natta to shite mo, kanojo no hanabi ni awasete ninjutsu wo hirou suru dake. Kore ga "Shuumatsuban" no shigoto to dou kankei suru to iu no da!
|vo_08_04_tl         = Every time I meet her, she says something like "Hi, little tanuki, wanna have some fun at the festival?" But I'm nothing like a tanuki. And I 'm not interested in festivals. And even if I did go with her, it would only be to showcase my ninjutsu alongside her fireworks. How is that even related to my work at the Shuumatsuban?!

|vo_08_05_title      = 雷電将軍について…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About the [[Raiden Shogun]]
|vo_08_05_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Raiden Shogun.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = あのお方は…拙が会えるような御仁ではない。知りたいことがあれば、綾華お嬢様に聞いた方が早い。
|vo_08_05_rm         = Ano okata wa... setsu ga aeru you na gojin de wa nai. Shiritai koto ga areba, Ayaka-ojou-sama ni kiita hou ga hayai.
|vo_08_05_tl         = She is... not the kind of person I'd ever get to meet. If you want to know more about her, it'd be easier if you asked Lady Ayaka.

|vo_08_06_title      = 八重神子について…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Yae Miko]]
|vo_08_06_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yae Miko.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 彼女はいつも拙の頭を撫でたがる。対して拙は手を噛む勇気も、反抗する勇気もない。断れば大惨事になりかねないと感じる。しかし、このまま撫でられ続けたら、本当に背が伸びなくなるのでは？ど…どうすればいいのだ…
|vo_08_06_rm         = Kanojo wa itsumo setsu no atama wo nadetagaru. Taishite setsu wa te wo kamu yuuki mo, hankou suru yuuki mo nai. Kotowareba daisanji ni narikanenai to kanjiru. Do... dou sureba ii no da...
|vo_08_06_tl         = She's always patting me on the head. But I'm not brave enough to bite her hand for it, or to resist her. I feel like if I tell her to stop, something terrible might happen. But if I keep getting pats on the head, what happens if I really can't grow any taller? W-What should I do...

|vo_08_07_title      = 荒瀧一斗について…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Arataki Itto]]
|vo_08_07_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Arataki Itto.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = なぜあんなにやかましい者がいるのだ。しかもあんなに背が高いのはなぜだ！
|vo_08_07_rm         = Naze anna ni yakamashii mono ga iru no da. Shika mo anna ni se ga takai no wa naze da!
|vo_08_07_tl         = How can such a noisy person exist? And how did he get so tall?!

|vo_08_08_title      = 久岐忍について…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Kuki Shinobu]]
|vo_08_08_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Kuki Ninja.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = ピンとこない名前だな…待て、荒瀧一斗の子分なのか？ならやつも睡眠を妨害してくるに違いない。何せ同じ穴のムジナ、いや、同じ穴のタヌキっていう言葉があるくらいだからな！
|vo_08_08_rm         = Pin to konai namae da na... Mate, Arataki Itto no kobun na no ka? Nara yatsu mo suimin wo bougai shite kuru ni chigainai. Nanise onaji ana no mujina, iya, onaji ana no tanuki tte iu kotoba ga aru kurai da kara na!
|vo_08_08_tl         = That name doesn't ring a bell... Wait, she's Arataki Itto's sidekick? Then she must be someone who'll disturb my sleep too. You know what they say about mujina&mdash; I mean, tanuki from the same den!<ref group="TN •">The Japanese idiom {{ja|同じ穴の狢|onaji ana no mujina|lit=mujina of the same den,}} is equivalent to the English "birds of a feather." The mujina is the most commonly referenced animal in this saying, but variations with {{ja|狐|kitsune}} and {{ja|狸|tanuki}} exist. Sayu, being themed after a mujina herself, realizes this and changes her wording mid-sentence.</ref>

<!-- More About Sayu -->
|vo_09_01_title      = {name}を知る・1
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = ふみゃ…ふみゃ…ふみゃ…
|vo_09_01_rm         = Fumya... fumya... fumya...
|vo_09_01_tl         = *snores*

|vo_09_02_title      = {name}を知る・2
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship    = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = ええっと、忍術流派の名前か？…あれ…思い出せない、まだ目が覚めきってないから、もう一眠りしたら思い出せるかもしれない。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Eetto, ninjutsu ryuuha no namae ka?... Are... Omoidasenai, mada me ga samekittenai kara, mou hitonemuri shitara omoidaseru ka mo shirenai.
|vo_09_02_tl         = Huh, the name of my style of ninjutsu...? Um... I can't remember. I'm still not fully awake yet, so maybe I'll remember after another nap.

|vo_09_03_title      = {name}を知る・3
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship    = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 主になら教えてもいいぞ。だが、まず笑わないと約束してくれ。でないと、二度と口をききたくなくなるからな。拙の流派は…「嗚呼流」という。<br />拙たちの忍術は敵をもてあそぶことに長けているゆえ、こう名づけられた。だが、しかし、うう…
|vo_09_03_rm         = Nushi ni nara oshiete mo ii zo. Daga, mazu warawanai to yakusoku shite kure. De nai to, nido to kuchi wo kikitakunaku naru kara na. Setsu no ryuuha wa... "Oko-ryuu" to iu.<br />Setsu-tachi no ninjutsu wa teki wo moteasobu koto ni taketeiru yue, kou nadzukerareta. Daga, shikashi, uu...
|vo_09_03_tl         = I can tell you. But first, promise that you won't laugh, or else I'll never want to talk to you again. My style is called... the "Yoohoo Art."<br />Our ninjutsu excels at making fun of the enemy, so that's how its name came to be. But, still, ugh...

|vo_09_04_title      = {name}を知る・4
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship    = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 木登りはできるか？拙は非常に得意だ、主に教えてやってもいいぞ。それと、神社にある木は特にサボり…いや、特に昼寝に適しているのだ。今度、昼寝をしたい時は、拙のところに来るがいい。一緒に登って昼寝するぞ。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Kinobori wa dekiru ka? Setsu wa hijou ni tokui da, nushi ni oshiete yatte mo ii zo. Sore to, jinja ni aru ki wa toku ni sabori... iya, toku ni hirune ni tekishiteiru no da. Kondo, hirune wo shitai toki wa, setsu no tokoro ni kuru ga ii. Issho ni nobotte hirune suru zo.
|vo_09_04_tl         = Do you know how to climb trees? I'm really good at it, so I can teach you. Also, there's a tree at the shrine that's especially good for skipping work... I mean, good for taking naps in. Next time you want to take a nap, you should come and see me. We'll climb it and take a nap together.

|vo_09_05_title      = {name}を知る・5
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship    = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = この服は師匠からいただいた物。ムジナを原型に作られており、逃げる時に役立つのだとか…もう一人前だから自分の身は自分で守らなければならないと言われたあと、この服を残し、師匠は去っていった。拙のような身長で、本当に一人前になれたのか？<br />主はこの先も傍にいてくれるか？本当に拙を見捨てないか？
|vo_09_05_rm         = Kono fuku wa shishou kara itadaita mono. Mujina wo genkei ni tsukurarete ori, nigeru toki ni yakudatsu no da to ka... Mou ichininmae da kara jibun no mi wa jibun de mamoranakereba naranai to iwareta ato, kono fuku wo nokoshi, shishou wa satte itta. Setsu no you na shinchou de, hontou ni ichininmae ni nareta no ka?<br />Nushi wa kono saki mo soba ni ite kureru ka? Hontou ni setsu wo misutenai ka?
|vo_09_05_tl         = This outfit was something I got from my master. They said it was modeled after a mujina, and it would come in handy while escaping or something... and that I'm all grown up now, so I have to protect myself. Then they left me this outfit, and went away. But at this height, am I really all grown up?<br />You're going to keep me company from now on? You really won't leave me?

<!-- Miscellaneous II -->
|vo_10_01_title      = {name}の趣味…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 帽子を被ると巫女姉さんに見つかる心配をしなくていい。そして一日中ぐっすり眠れる、この世で一番幸せなことだ。
|vo_10_01_rm         = Boushi wo kaburu to miko-nee-san ni mitsukaru shinpai wo shinakute ii. Soshite ichinichi-juu gussuri nemureru, kono yo de ichiban shiawase na koto da.
|vo_10_01_tl         = When I put my hood on, I don't have to worry about the shrine maiden finding me. And then I can sleep tight all day long. It's the happiest thing in the world.

|vo_10_02_title      = {name}の悩み・勘違い
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles: Misunderstanding
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles - Misunderstanding.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 初対面の者は拙を見ると「タヌキだ」と騒ぐ。だが、早柚は早柚だ、タヌキなどではない。
|vo_10_02_rm         = Shotaimen no mono wa setsu wo miru to "tanuki da" to sawagu. Daga, Sayu wa Sayu da, tanuki nado de wa nai.
|vo_10_02_tl         = People who meet me for the first time will take one look and make a big fuss, saying "you're a tanuki." But Sayu is just Sayu, and not a tanuki at all.

|vo_10_03_title      = {name}の悩み・身長
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles: Height
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles - Height.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = いつになったら背が伸びるのだろうか？同年代の者たちは、すでに拙の倍くらい身長がある…このままではいけない、もっと寝れば必ず背が伸びる！というわけだから、寝るぞ、おやすみ。
|vo_10_03_rm         = Itsu ni nattara se ga nobiru no darou ka? Dounendai no mono-tachi wa, sude ni setsu no bai kurai shinchou ga aru... Kono mama de wa ikenai, motto nereba kanarazu se ga nobiru! To iu wake da kara, neru zo, oyasumi.
|vo_10_03_tl         = I wonder when I'll grow taller? Other people my age are already around twice my height... I can't let this go on &mdash; if I get more sleep, I'll definitely get taller! That's why I'm going to sleep now. Good night.

|vo_10_04_title      = {name}の悩み・悪循環
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles: Feedback Loop
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles - Feedback Loop.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 悩み事が多いと身長が伸びなくなると聞いた…はぁ、一体どうすればいいのだ…
|vo_10_04_rm         = Nayamigoto ga ooi to shinchou ga nobinaku naru to kiita... Haa, ittai dou sureba ii no da...
|vo_10_04_tl         = I heard that if you've got a head full of worries, you won't grow... *sigh* What am I supposed to do...

|vo_10_05_title      = 好きな食べ物…
|vo_10_05_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_05_tx         = 一度にたくさんの活力をまかなえる食べ物、例えばおにぎりだ。起きた後に1つ食べれば、頭がフラフラしなくなり、また寝ることができる。
|vo_10_05_rm         = Ichido ni takusan no katsuryoku wo makanaeru tabemono, tatoeba onigiri da. Okita ato ni hitotsu tabereba, atama ga furafura shinaku nari, mata neru koto ga dekiru.
|vo_10_05_tl         = Foods that provide you with a lot of energy at once, like onigiri. If you eat one right after you wake up, you'll stop feeling groggy and unsteady, and then you can go back to sleep.

|vo_10_06_title      = 嫌いな食べ物…
|vo_10_06_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_06_tx         = 身長を伸ばしたければ、食べ物の好き嫌いをしてはいけない。そういえば、最近身長に変化がないような…食べる野菜の量が減ったからなのか…だがサラダはお腹いっぱいにならないし、苦いし、うぅ…
|vo_10_06_rm         = Shinchou wo nobashitakereba, tabemono no suki-kirai wo shite wa ikenai. Sou ieba, saikin shinchou ni henka ga nai you na... Taberu yasai no ryou ga hetta kara na no ka... Daga sarada wa onaka ippai ni naranai shi, nigai shi, uu...
|vo_10_06_tl         = If you want to grow taller, you can't be picky with food choices. Speaking of which, it seems like my height hasn't changed at all lately... Maybe it's because I've been eating fewer vegetables... But salad doesn't fill me up, and it's bitter, ugh...

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = 贈り物を受け取る·1
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = お腹いっぱい。これで安心して眠れる。
|vo_11_01_rm         = Onaka ippai. Kore de anshin shite nemureru.
|vo_11_01_tl         = I'm so full. Now I can sleep in peace.

|vo_11_02_title      = 贈り物を受け取る·2
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 食べているうちに…眠くなってきちゃった。
|vo_11_02_rm         = Tabeteiru uchi ni... nemuku nattekichatta.
|vo_11_02_tl         = While I was eating... I got sleepy.

|vo_11_03_title      = 贈り物を受け取る·3
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = 何とかして…逃げないと。
|vo_11_03_rm         = Nantoka shite... nigenai to.
|vo_11_03_tl         = Somehow... I need to get out of here.

<!-- Birthday -->
|vo_12_01_title      = 誕生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 学びたい忍術があるのか？教えてやってもいいが、拙ができるものだけだぞ。ん？なぜ今日は寝てないのかって？あぁ…まだ眠くないのだ。しかも今日は特別な日、寝てしまっては勿体ない。誕生日おめでとうと、拙自身の口から言いたかったのだ。
|vo_12_01_rm         = Manabitai ninjutsu ga aru no ka? Oshiete yatte mo ii ga, setsu ga dekiru mono dake da zo. N? Naze kyou wa netenai no ka tte? Aa... Mada nemukunai no da. Shika mo kyou wa tokubetsu na hi, nete shimatte wa mottainai. Tanjoubi omedetou to, setsu jishin no kuchi kara iitakatta no da.
|vo_12_01_tl         = Is there any ninjutsu you want to learn? I can teach you, but only from what I know myself. Hmm? Why am I not asleep today? Ah... It's because I'm not sleepy yet. And on top of that, today is a special day, so it'd be a shame if I slept through it. I wanted to tell you in person: happy birthday.

<!-- Feelings About Ascension -->
|vo_13_01_title      = 突破した感想・起
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension     = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = 少しは背が伸びたか？
|vo_13_01_rm         = Sukoshi wa se ga nobita ka?
|vo_13_01_tl         = Did I just get a little taller?

|vo_13_02_title      = 突破した感想・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension     = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = よし、逃げ足が速くなった、もう捕まらないぞ。
|vo_13_02_rm         = Yoshi, nigeashi ga hayaku natta, mou tsukamaranai zo.
|vo_13_02_tl         = Nice, I can run away even faster. They'll never catch me now.

|vo_13_03_title      = 突破した感想・転
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension     = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 拙ひとりだったら…途中で寝てしまっていたかもしれない…材料集めを手伝ってくれて感謝いたすぞ。
|vo_13_03_rm         = Setsu hitori dattara... tochuu de nete shimatteita ka mo shirenai... Zairyou atsume wo tetsudatte kurete kansha itasu zo.
|vo_13_03_tl         = If I was by myself... I might have just fallen asleep halfway through... Thank you so much for helping me gather materials.

|vo_13_04_title      = 突破した感想・結
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension     = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 師匠が言ってた通り、拙は一人前になったみたいだ。身長は…そんなこと今はもういい、大事なのは…主が拙のそばにいることだ。
|vo_13_04_rm         = Shishou ga iiteta toori, setsu wa ichininmae ni natta mitai da. Shinchou wa... sonna koto ima wa mou ii, daiji na no wa... nushi ga setsu no soba ni iru koto da.
|vo_13_04_tl         = It seems like I really can stand on my own now, just like my master said. As for my height... let's not worry about that anymore. The important thing is... that you're here to keep me company.
}}
